Articles.Content:
I'd like to start reading the comics again.

I used to read one of the series (I can't remember which) for a very short time, but money was tight and had to stop. I'd like to get back into it, but there's so many titles, and so many years of stories to choose from according to [this](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Spider-Man_titles).

Any idea where to start, and which series to choose?
